heat_release_rate.comment: uniform distribution for maximum HRR, triangular distribution for alfa (alfa*t^2 based fire development)

origin_of_fire.comment: binomial distribution, fire can start in room or elsewhere (corridor, hall)

evacuees_concentration.comment: The parameter for calculating the number of persons in ROOM, COR(ridor) and STAI(rcase). The density means number of meters for one person.
evacuees_concentration.comment2: The specific and floor elements are supported: ROOM_1_1 / STAI_FLOOR:1 (staircases on floor 1)

evacuees_speed_params.comment: Alpha and beta parameters are for the Frantzich and Nilsson equation relating walking speed with the extinction coefficient. Max speed for the unimpeded walk of person. All the parameters are for the normal dist

pre_evacuation_time.comment: Parameters for lognormal distribution taken from BS.

window_open.comment: binomial distribution: people open/half open/close windows based on outdoor temperature and in-room air conditioning

sprinkler_trigger_temperature.comment: normal distribution for trigger temperatures, binomial for not_broken

fire_detector_trigger_temperature.comment: normal distribution for trigger temperatures, binomial for not_broken
